metadata.title: CVE-2018-8810 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In radare2 2.4.0, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in theget_ivar_list_t function of mach0_classes.c. Remote attackers couldleverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a craftedMach-O file.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
